field.filter: SELECT PowerConnection WHERE id != :this->id AND location_id = :this->location_id AND finalclass IN ('PowerSource','Transformateur','ArmoireTGBT','ArmoireDistributionElect')
SELECT SoftwareInstance WHERE id != :this->id AND finalclass IN ('Middleware','PCSoftware','OtherSoftware')
SELECT SoftwareInstance WHERE id != :this->id AND finalclass IN ('Middleware','PCSoftware','OtherSoftware')
SELECT SoftwareInstance WHERE id != :this->id AND finalclass IN ('Middleware','PCSoftware','OtherSoftware')
SELECT CentraleIncendie WHERE id != :this->id AND location_id = :this->location_id
